markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Change](/Feats.aspx?ID=2089) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 197 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=80)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5); [Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2083)

</column>

---

You can shift between your identities with ease. Instead of spending 1 minute to change your identity, you can now do so as a 3-action activity. If you are legendary in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), you can perform this change as a 1-action activity.
name: Quick Change
